name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.groups.cache.secs
description:
This is the config controlling the validity of the entries in the cache
    containing the user->group mapping. When this duration has expired,
    then the implementation of the group mapping provider is invoked to get
    the groups of the user and then cached back.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.response
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    RESPONSE phase which do not involve holding a lock.
    See org.apache.hadoop.ipc.ProcessingDetails.Timing for more details on
    this phase. This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: dfs.balancer.max-size-to-move
description:
Maximum number of bytes that can be moved by the balancer in a single
    thread.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.interval-ms
description:
Time of interval that fetcher retry to fetch again when some
  non-fatal failure happens because of some events like NM restart.

name: fs.du.interval
description: File space usage statistics refresh interval in msec.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources
description:
The maximum number of resources a map reduce job is allowed to
    submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command
    line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.

name: ipc.client.rpc-timeout.ms
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  If ipc.client.ping is set to true and this rpc-timeout is greater than
  the value of ipc.ping.interval, the effective value of the rpc-timeout is
  rounded up to multiple of ipc.ping.interval.
